Call us Toll Free: 1-877-403-6537 Refer A Friend Bathroom Toilet Paper&Facial Tissue Bathroom Cleaners Toilet Bowl Cleaners Bath&Bar Hand Soaps Hand Sanitizer Air Freshener Spray Kitchen All Purpose Cleaners Household Paper Towels Machine Dishwashing Detergents Hand Dishwashing Soaps Latex Rubber Gloves Sponges&Scouring Pads Eco-Friendly Marcal Pro Clorox Green Works Seventh Generation Nature's Source Arm&Hammer Essentials Eco-Friendly Simple Green Home Products Janitorial Products Eco Friendly Soap Recycled Paper Products Brands Soft Scrub Clorox Windex Lysol Simple Green Cascade GOJO Charmin Kleenex Tissues Glad Boraxo Hand Soap Ajax Comet Mr. Clean Fabuloso Febreze Expert Advice Home > Restaurant&Foodservice Supply > Aluminum Pans&Trays Home > Food Service Supplies > Aluminum Pans&Trays Aluminum Pans&Trays Order any aluminum pan, aluminum tray, or matching lid for your restaurant or catering company today and have them shipped to you tomorrow! FREE SHIPPING on all orders over $50 and FAST DELIVERY in 2-3 days as well. We carry a broad line of disposable wholesale deep and shallow, full and half aluminum trays in both round and oblong; round aluminum serving trays; and their appropriate lids in both foil board and plastic dome.

Summer Special! *FREE SHIPPING* for all orders $50 or more!
We carry the top Cleaning Products and Janitorial Supplies
CleaningProductsWorld.com carries over 4,000 cleaning and janitorial products, so you can get all the supplies you need, in one convenient place, without ever having to leave your home or office. We ship next day from 31 strategically located warehouses across the US so you can get your order fast in 2-3 business days. Having been in the industry for over 60 years, we know our cleaning products and janitorial supplies and guarantee their quality.
If you ever have any questions, comments, or requests, please feel free to contact me directly. I love hearing from our customers and assisting you in any way possible.
Sincerely, Kenn President
